Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with delays after signal problem at 95th/Dan Ryan. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with delays after signal problem at 95th/Dan Ryan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
